section.p: This section defines a patient's implanted and external health and medical devices and equipment. This section lists any pertinent durable medical equipment (DME) used to help maintain the patient's health status. All equipment relevant to the diagnosis, care, or treatment of a patient should be included. Devices applied to, or placed in, the patient are represented with the Procedure Activity Procedure (V2) template. Equipment supplied to the patient (e.g., pumps, inhalers, wheelchairs) is represented by the Non-Medicinal Supply Activity V2 template. These devices may be grouped together within a Medical Equipment Organizer. The organizer would probably not be used with devices applied in or on the patient but rather to organize a group of medical supplies the patient has been supplied with.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7944.CONF:1098-10404, CONF:1098-32523 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.23"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Medical Equipment Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.23)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15381)/@code="46264-8" Medical Equipment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15382, CONF:1098-30828)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-7948, CONF:1098-30351)
Conforms to Medical Equipment Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.135)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-31125, CONF:1098-31861)
Conforms to Non Medicinal Supply Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50:2014-06-09)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-31885, CONF:1098-31886)
Conforms to Procedure Activity Procedure2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Medical Equipment Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.23)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15381)/@code="46264-8" Medical Equipment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15382, CONF:1098-30828)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7946, R2.0=CONF:1098-7946)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7947, R2.0=CONF:1098-7947)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-7948, CONF:1098-30351)
Conforms to Medical Equipment Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.135)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-31125, CONF:1098-31861)
Conforms to Non Medicinal Supply Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50:2014-06-09)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-31885, CONF:1098-31886)
Conforms to Procedure Activity Procedure2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14:2014-06-09)
